title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Competencies: Project-Based Language Education Course for Practical Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform work simulation projects with over 80% accuracy using specialized field-specific practical language expressions.
Learners continuously improve their language application skills through formative assessment based on feedback from peers and mentors.

Learners set ≥3 personalized learning goals using digital tools (e.g., Google Docs, Notion), create a portfolio reflecting self-assessments ≥2 times/month, and meet ≥4 of 5 institution-provided rubric criteria in the final portfolio
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
